docs.snippet: Broncos receiver Wes Welker and his Seahawks counterpart Doug Baldwin lacked the size and the blazing speed to play in the N.F.L., but try telling them that....
docs.lead_paragraph: Broncos receiver Wes Welker and his Seahawks counterpart Doug Baldwin lacked the size and the blazing speed to play in the N.F.L., but try telling them that.
docs.abstract: Diminutive receivers Wes Welker of Denver Broncos and Doug Baldwin of Seattle Seahawks were not drafted out of college but have gone on to stellar NFL careers.

headline.main: Diamonds in Rough Shrug Off the Cut of Rejection

docs.lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning’s father said his son was “not chasing records” and “still enjoys” football.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Peyton Manning’s father Archie says he envisions his son playing beyond Super Bowl 48; says Denver Broncos quarterback is still driven by love of the game and competition; other football news noted.

headline.main: Archie Manning Envisions Peyton Playing Past Super Bowl
headline.print_headline: Archie Manning Envisions Peyton Playing Past Super Bowl

docs.snippet: The asking price of Super Bowl tickets being resold has fallen nearly 25 percent since the game’s participants became known, according to a market tracker, though a surge is expected....
docs.lead_paragraph: The asking price of Super Bowl tickets being resold has fallen nearly 25 percent since the game’s participants became known, according to a market tracker, though a surge is expected.
docs.abstract: Ticket brokers say asking price of Super Bowl tickets being resold has fallen by nearly 25 percent since Denver Broncos and Seattle Seahawks won the right to represent their conferences; pace of the decline is faster than in recent years, and it suggests that ticket sellers may have overestimated the enthusiasm for watching the title matchup in frigid weather.

headline.main: Ticket Prices Fall on the Resale Market, Brokers Say
headline.print_headline: Ticket Prices Fall on the Resale Market, Brokers Say
